Title: Spectrally efficient SSB signals for W-band Links enabled by Kramers-Kronig receiver
Abstract: © OSA 2018.We demonstrate a radio-over-fiber link based on the Kramers-Kronig receiver for the first time. Using this technique, we recover an 11 GBd single sideband signal with a net spectral efficiency of 3.4 (bit/s)/Hz at W-band.
